syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

learning_objectives.description: understand that when a source of sound waves moves relative to a stationary observer, the observed frequency is different from the source frequency (understanding of the Doppler effect for a stationary source and a moving observer is not required)
use the expression fo = fsv/(v Â± vs) for the observed frequency when a source of sound waves moves relative to a stationary observer
